title: The 'Aadrika' Antique Gold Short Haaram with Emerald Center
materials: 22K Gold with Antique Hyderabadi Polish. Features high-quality round-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones and a central Emerald cabochon.
features: This exquisite short haaram features a delicate floral motif chain with a central pendant showcasing intricate filigree work. The pendant is adorned with sparkling CZ stones surrounding a vibrant Emerald cabochon. The design incorporates traditional South Indian beadwork (gundlu) along the bottom edge, adding a touch of classic elegance. Antique finish to enhance the vintage appeal.
occasions: traditional South Indian ceremonies like Muhurtham
and Half-Saree functions (Langa Voni Function). Also suitable for festive occasions such as Diwali and Sankranti.
description: This 'Aadrika' Haaram is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The antique gold finish, combined with the sparkling CZ stones and vibrant Emerald, creates a timeless piece that blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty, making it a treasured heirloom for generations. The Emerald center symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it an auspicious choice for significant life events.
